title: Captured
description: Only the strongest humans survive at the Academy of Vampires The weak become food  Plucked from my normal life. Imprisoned in this vampire hell.  They say I’m a one-in-a-million genetic freak. But I’m no-one. Just a human girl who wants to escape.  Nero, Dante, and Raphael are the vampire princes who want my blood. They want me kneeling at their feet, a perfect slave. But I will resist their deadly games. Withstand their charms and seduction.  But can a human girl survive in a school full of vampires?  Captured is a reverse harem PNR academy bully romance that contains cursing, dark themes, and sexual situations.
author: Sofia Daniel
